attributes.action: sack MPs who have abused the expense system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public have had enough of MPs who have claimed expenses from manure to kit kats to carrier bags to hotel room mini bars, as well as those who switch their second home designation for the purposes of helping themselves to taxpayers money. They say it is within the rules but then say the rules need to change. They spent so much time doing what they could they never stopped to think if they SHOULD.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
